Class PlasmaPhysics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.matter.plasma.PlasmaPhysics
public class PlasmaPhysics extends Object
Plasma physics calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    alfvenVelocity(double magneticField, double massDensity)
    Alfvén velocity. v_A = B / √(μ₀ ρ)
    static double
    beta(double density, double temperature, double magneticField)
    Beta: ratio of plasma pressure to magnetic pressure. β = nkT / (B²/2μ₀)
    static double
    collisionFrequency(double density, double temperature, double coulombLog)
    Collision frequency (electron-ion).
    static double
    coulombLogarithm(double density, double temperature)
    Coulomb logarithm (approximate). ln(Λ) ≈ ln(12π n λ_D³)
    static double
    debyeLength(double temperature, double density)
    Debye length: characteristic screening distance. λ_D = √(ε₀ k_B T / n e²)
    static double
    electronCyclotronFrequency(double magneticField)
    Electron cyclotron frequency (gyrofrequency). ω_ce = eB / m_e
    static double
    ionCyclotronFrequency(double magneticField, double ionMass, int chargeNumber)
    Ion cyclotron frequency. ω_ci = ZeB / m_i
    static double
    larmorRadius(double velocity, double magneticField, double mass)
    Larmor radius (gyroradius). r_L = m v_perp / (eB)
    static double
    plasmaFrequency(double density)
    Plasma frequency: natural oscillation frequency. ω_p = √(n e² / ε₀ m_e)
    static double
    plasmaFrequencyHz(double density)
    Plasma frequency in Hz.
    static double
    plasmaParameter(double density, double debyeLength)
    Plasma parameter: number of particles in Debye sphere.
    static double
    soundSpeed(double temperature, double ionMass, double gamma)
    Sound speed in plasma. c_s = √(γ k_B T / m_i)
    static double
    spitzerResistivity(double temperature, double coulombLog, int Z)
    Spitzer resistivity. η = (π Z e² m_e^(1/2) ln(Λ)) / ((4πε₀)² (k_B T_e)^(3/2))
    static double
    thermalVelocity(double temperature, double mass)
    Thermal velocity. v_th = √(k_B T / m)

  • Method Details

    • debyeLength

      public static double debyeLength(double temperature, double density)
      Debye length: characteristic screening distance. λ_D = √(ε₀ k_B T / n e²)
      Parameters:
      temperature - Electron temperature (K)
      density - Electron density (m⁻³)
      Returns:
      Debye length (m)

    • plasmaFrequency

      public static double plasmaFrequency(double density)
      Plasma frequency: natural oscillation frequency. ω_p = √(n e² / ε₀ m_e)
      Parameters:
      density - Electron density (m⁻³)
      Returns:
      Angular plasma frequency (rad/s)

    • plasmaFrequencyHz

      public static double plasmaFrequencyHz(double density)
      Plasma frequency in Hz.

    • electronCyclotronFrequency

      public static double electronCyclotronFrequency(double magneticField)
      Electron cyclotron frequency (gyrofrequency). ω_ce = eB / m_e

    • ionCyclotronFrequency

      public static double ionCyclotronFrequency(double magneticField, double ionMass, int chargeNumber)
      Ion cyclotron frequency. ω_ci = ZeB / m_i

    • larmorRadius

      public static double larmorRadius(double velocity, double magneticField, double mass)
      Larmor radius (gyroradius). r_L = m v_perp / (eB)

    • thermalVelocity

      public static double thermalVelocity(double temperature, double mass)
      Thermal velocity. v_th = √(k_B T / m)

    • plasmaParameter

      public static double plasmaParameter(double density, double debyeLength)
      Plasma parameter: number of particles in Debye sphere. Λ = n λ_D³ Plasma is ideal when Λ >> 1

    • coulombLogarithm

      public static double coulombLogarithm(double density, double temperature)
      Coulomb logarithm (approximate). ln(Λ) ≈ ln(12π n λ_D³)

    • alfvenVelocity

      public static double alfvenVelocity(double magneticField, double massDensity)
      Alfvén velocity. v_A = B / √(μ₀ ρ)

    • soundSpeed

      public static double soundSpeed(double temperature, double ionMass, double gamma)
      Sound speed in plasma. c_s = √(γ k_B T / m_i)

    • beta

      public static double beta(double density, double temperature, double magneticField)
      Beta: ratio of plasma pressure to magnetic pressure. β = nkT / (B²/2μ₀)

    • spitzerResistivity

      public static double spitzerResistivity(double temperature, double coulombLog, int Z)
      Spitzer resistivity. η = (π Z e² m_e^(1/2) ln(Λ)) / ((4πε₀)² (k_B T_e)^(3/2))

    • collisionFrequency

      public static double collisionFrequency(double density, double temperature, double coulombLog)
      Collision frequency (electron-ion).
